item.title: Ms. Angenie Jairam
item.description:
About Ms. Jairam

Angenie Jairam, often known as Ms Jairam, is deeply committed to making a significant impact in the healthcare sector. As a Medical Gas Specialist and Certified Medical Gas Inspector with expertise in Disease and Infection Control, she is driven by the mission to ensure safety and excellence for patients. She specializes in designing, supplying, and installing medical gas equipment that adheres to the rigorous standards and regulations in Trinidad and Tobago and internationally.

item.title: Networking Opportunities
item.description: The FCOC will provide members with a variety of opportunities to network and connect with other local businesses, including events, workshops, and online forums. By building strong relationships and partnerships, members can expand their customer base, share ideas, best practices, and create new opportunities for growth.

item.title: Advocacy and Representation
item.description: The FCOC will serve as a strong advocate for its members, representing their needs and interests to local government officials and other decision-makers. By promoting the voice of local businesses, the chamber can help shape policies and initiatives that support economic growth and development in Fyzabad.

item.title: Anthony Da Costa
item.description:
About Mr. Da Costa

Anthony Da Costa is an enthusiastic entrepreneur with a rich background in the oil and gas sector. His journey from technician to business owner exemplifies his dedication to growth and innovation. As Vice President of the Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, he brings both technical expertise and entrepreneurial insight to the organization.

Professional Journey

Early Beginnings

  • Started repairing speakers and electronics at age 11
  • Completed trade studies as an electrical technician at Metal Industries Company (MIC)

Oil and Gas Career

  • Joined Trinmar Operations in 2001 as an apprentice
  • Advanced to Electrical Instrumentation Technician
  • Over 13 years of experience in the sector

Entrepreneurial Success

Founded Jus Hurtz LTD in 2013:

item.title: Ms. Dawn Daniel
item.description:
About Ms. Daniel

Dawn Daniel brings 30 years of experience as a director in her family-owned catering business. With a Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration, she combines academic knowledge with practical business experience to excel in strategic planning and management.

Professional Experience

Catering Business Leadership

  • Director of family-owned catering business for 30 years
  • Oversees strategic planning and management of kitchen facilities
  • Manages contract with the School Feeding Programme
  • Specializes in event coordination and business growth

Education

  • Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration

Community Involvement

Dawn is deeply passionate about:

item.title: Resources and Support
item.description: The FCOC will provide members with access to valuable resources and support, including educational materials, training programs, and business tools. By equipping members with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed, the chamber can help to build a more resilient and competitive local business community.

item.title: Group Health Insurance
item.description: As a valued member of The Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, you are invited to join our Group health insurance plan. This plan offers significant benefits by providing comprehensive healthcare coverage to members and their immediate families as well as their employees. Our group insurance plan includes a broad range of medical services, from preventive care to emergency treatments.

item.description:
About Mrs. Yatali-Harridass

Healthcare Leadership

  • Joined The Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce in 2022
  • Active committee member
  • Elected as Assistant Secretary
  • Focuses on business community development

Agricultural Pursuits

Since 2019, Michelle has expanded into agriculture:

Professional Qualifications

    • Strategic guidance

Chamber Involvement

  • Member since 2019
  • Former Vice President (2022)

  • Focused on empowering individuals through education

Expertise

  • Strategic Planning

  • Insurance Services
  • Professional Training

As Treasurer of the Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, Sandra brings her extensive financial expertise and strategic planning skills to ensure sound fiscal management and growth of the organization.

item.title: Ms. Kavita Dabiedeen
item.description:
About Ms. Dabiedeen

Kavita Dabiedeen is a dynamic professional with extensive experience in public service, marketing, and community development. Her diverse background includes roles in politics, youth development, and business, making her an effective advocate for growth and opportunity.

Professional Experience

Political Career

  • Opposition Senator in the Parliament of Trinidad and Tobago (2009)
  • Youth Officer for Oropouche West Constituency (2008-2010)
  • Represented Trinidad and Tobago at Commonwealth Youth Forum (2009)

Current Roles

  • Marketing Manager at DNA & Associates Ltd.
  • Financial Advisor and Insurance Agent at Maritime Financial Group
  • Former Sales and Marketing Manager at Aditya Enterprises

Chamber Leadership

  • Active member since July 2022
  • Public Relations Officer
  • Team Lead for fyzabad.org website project
  • Collaborated on skill training workshop with Police Youth Club

Personal Achievements

  • Competed in Miss Fyzabad Carnival Queen Pageant (2007)
    • Won Miss Congeniality
    • Won Most Improved Award
  • Passionate creator of eggless and flourless healthy desserts

Core Values

  • Commitment to authenticity
  • Belief in kindness opening doors
  • Service to others as service to God
  • Community-focused initiatives

Expertise

  • Public Relations
  • Marketing Strategy
  • Financial Advisory
  • Youth Development
  • Community Engagement
  • Project Leadership

As Public Relations Officer of the Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, Kavita brings her marketing expertise and community engagement experience to enhance the chamber’s outreach and impact.

item.title: 2015 Honda Vezel - Unmatched Efficiency & Style!
item.description:
Experience the perfect blend of performance, safety, and innovation with the Honda Vezel!

Key Features

  • Engine: 1.5L Hybrid with up to 137 HP
  • Fuel Efficiency: Up to 30 km/l (highway)
  • Safety: 5-star safety rating

Vehicle Details

Feature Specification
Year 2015
Make Honda
Model Vezel
Mileage 150,807 km
Condition Used
Transmission Automatic
Fuel Type Hybrid
Price $115,000 TTD

Description

Introducing the sleek and stylish 2015 Honda Vezel! This reliable SUV boasts a powerful 1.5L engine with up to 137 HP in hybrid mode, ensuring an exhilarating driving experience. Enjoy exceptional fuel efficiency of up to 30 km/l on the highway, making it perfect for both your daily commute and weekend getaways.

item.title: Home Care Taker Needed
item.description:
Position Overview

Seeking a reliable and experienced home care taker for regular house maintenance in Oropuche. The ideal candidate should be trustworthy, detail-oriented, and able to work independently.

Key Responsibilities

Cleaning Tasks

  • General dusting and sweeping of all rooms
  • Mopping of all floor surfaces
  • Bathroom cleaning and sanitization
  • Kitchen cleaning including countertops and appliances
  • Window cleaning
  • Vacuuming carpets and rugs (if applicable)
  • Tidying and organizing living spaces

Additional Tasks

  • Laundry assistance if required
  • Basic organization of household items
  • Waste removal and bin management
  • Light ironing if needed

Schedule

  • Frequency: 1-2 times per week
  • Schedule to be discussed and arranged
  • Flexible timing available

Requirements

  • Experience in home cleaning and maintenance
  • Attention to detail
  • Reliable and punctual
  • References preferred

Location

Oropuche area

item.title: Responsible Babysitter Needed - Oropuche Area
item.description:
Position Overview

Seeking a responsible and experienced babysitter for a 4-month-old baby in the Oropuche area. The position requires dedication, reliability, and genuine care for infant development.

Key Responsibilities

Childcare Duties

  • Infant feeding and meal preparation
  • Diaper changing and hygiene maintenance
  • Baby bathing and grooming
  • Ensuring baby’s safety and well-being at all times

Additional Tasks

  • Bottle washing and sterilization
  • Baby-related laundry
  • Minor housework associated with baby care
  • Maintaining a clean and safe environment

Requirements

  • 1-2 years minimum childcare experience
  • Must be located in or near Oropuche area
  • Reliable and punctual
  • Strong references preferred

Schedule

  • Hours: 7 AM - 4 PM
  • Schedule is negotiable
  • Long-term position

Contact Information

For more details or to apply, please call: 475-5143

item.title: Mud House Museum
item.description:
About Us

Mud House Museum offers guided tours and engaging history lectures that immerse visitors in local culture. The venue also features event space and unique experiences like Chulha making, Chulha meals, and cocoa tea, making it a perfect destination for both learning and culinary exploration.

Our Services

  • Guided Tours: Explore the rich history and cultural significance of traditional mud houses
  • History Lectures: Learn about local heritage and traditional building techniques
  • Event Space: Host your special occasions in our unique cultural setting
  • Chulha Making: Experience traditional cooking stove crafting
  • Chulha Meals: Taste authentic dishes prepared on traditional mud stoves
  • Cocoa Tea: Enjoy this local delicacy prepared in the traditional way

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
Do You Want to Learn About The Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce?

If you have any questions or would like to learn more about The Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, we invite you to get in touch with us today.

Our friendly and knowledgeable team is here to answer your questions, provide information about membership, and assist you in any way we can. Whether you prefer to call or email, we are always happy to hear from you. We look forward to connecting and helping you take the next step in growing your business.

item.title: About Us
item.description:
Empowering Local Businesses, Driving Community Growth

We are a local organization dedicated to supporting and promoting businesses in Fyzabad and beyond. Our membership includes a diverse range of businesses, from small start-ups to established companies across a variety of industries. Our goal is to provide our members with the linkages to resources, networking opportunities, and advocacy they need to succeed and thrive.

At The Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, we believe in the power of collaboration with businesses, communities and other stakeholders. We are committed to fostering an environment where members can connect with other local businesses, share ideas and best practices, and work together to address common challenges and opportunities.

item.title: Local Business Trends to Watch in 2024
item.description:
The local business landscape is constantly evolving, and 2024 promises to bring exciting changes and opportunities. In this post, we’ll explore the key trends that local business owners should watch out for in the coming year.

Digital Transformation Continues

Small businesses are increasingly adopting digital tools to streamline their operations and improve customer experience. From contactless payments to online ordering systems, the digital transformation is making local businesses more efficient and competitive.

item.title: Welcome to Our Blog
item.description:
Welcome to our new blog! Here we’ll be sharing valuable insights about local businesses, community updates, and tips for both business owners and customers.

What to Expect

Our blog will feature:

  • Success stories from local businesses
  • Community event announcements
  • Business tips and best practices
  • Industry trends and analysis

Stay tuned for regular updates and feel free to reach out if you’d like to contribute or suggest topics!
